Entries.Tue: Don't mind my husband, Jorge. He isn't very friendly to strangers.#$e#If you get to know him better he'll warm up to you.#$e#I'm sure you two could become good friends one day!$h#$e#Since you're so interested in my husband I'll let you in on a little secret: he really likes leeks! You can find them in the mountains this time of year.
Entries.Tue6: It's nice of you to take the time to visit Jorge and I.#$e#Without young people around, we'd age much faster.$h
Entries.summer_Tue: Jorge is always a little less grumpy in the summer. The warm weather softens his bones.#$e#You might not be able to tell, but I can. I've known him for sixty years!
Entries.fall_Tue: I've been putting raisins in Jorge's oatmeal... but he hasn't said a word. I wonder if he even notices these things?
Entries.winter_Sat8: @, have I told you that Jorge and I have lived in our house for 30 years?#$e#I hope you stay here for a while.$h
